title: Victory Run 1
description: There's only one rule in Rock & Roll: Don't sleep with anyone in the band.Victory Payne is the hottest lead guitar player on the night club scene of Hollywood's infamous Sunset Strip. With nothing but her car and her guitar, she's ready to claw her way to success. Victory never gives up.Then she breaks rock's cardinal rule. She falls in love with her lead singer, the gorgeous and brooding Scott Walker. That is mistake number one.Mistake number two is a roadblock named Kellan Burns. Kellan is primed to claim the title of hottest lead guitar player in Los Angeles with his rugged good looks and his own guitar slung as low as his tight jeans. Kellan isn't the kind of guy to let some upstart babe with a six string stand in his way.Victory Payne, meet Kellan Burns.BOOM.Ladies, you will need a fire extinguisher for this one.Content Warning: Due to sexual situations and strong language, this novel may not be appropriate for readers under 18.
author: Devon Hartford
